pullrequest.title: Add design doc for converting protobuf messages to sdformat objects

content.raw:
It is indeed tedious. Also, as I mentioned in [gazebo issue 1028](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/1028/duplicate-parameter-definitions) our parameters definitions are currently duplicated in sdformat and protobuf, which is not ideal.

Though it doesn't fix the larger problem, this proposal will reduce the amount of code duplication in the `ServerFixture::Spawn*` functions, while providing more powerful functions for spawning models.
